reapack.name: sbp_PhantomFollower.jsfx
reapack.desc: SBP Phantom Follower - 5.1 Position Follower with Pseudo-Acoustics

version.author: (SBP)
version.changelog: v1.0 - Initial release. Follow Phantom Center coordinates with VBAP/Amplitude panning, coordinate transforms, deadzone filtering, and frequency-based pseudo-acoustics.

version.author: Sergey Bondarev (SBP)
version.changelog: v1.0 - Initial release. Follow Phantom Center coordinates with VBAP/Amplitude panning, coordinate transforms, deadzone filtering, and frequency-based pseudo-acoustics.

version.author: SBP & AI
version.changelog: v1.0 - Initial release: Professional 5.1 surround analyzer with real-time heat map visualization, 10-pair goniometer with phase correlation, ITU-R BS.1770-4 calibrated LUFS meters.

reapack.name: sbp_MagicDress.jsfx
reapack.desc: SBP Magic Dress — spectral-dressing effect with modulation and tail shaping

version.author: SBP & AI
version.changelog: Initial release: spectral reverb/dressing effect with modulation, tail shaping and diffuse processing.

version.author: SBP & AI
version.changelog: v3.5.1: Added SurroundWindow.lua module for dedicated surround path controls. Refactored surround path UI into separate modular window. Improved code organization and maintainability.

version.author: SBP & AI
version.changelog: v3.5.2: Added Full Circles mode for unlimited rotations using internal phase accumulator. Surround modes now: Vector 3-point / Circle Arc 3-point / Full Circles. Removed Speed multiplier from Circle Arc (now for arcs only), added Rotations Count & Start Angle for Full Circles mode. Fixed proper VBAP 5.1 panning with mono source distribution.

version.author: SBP & AI
version.changelog: v3.5.3: Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

version.author: SBP & AI
version.changelog: v3.5.4: Fixed surround path minor issue.

version.author: SBP & AI
version.changelog: Added Physical Doppler Mode Improved Audio Pitch algorithm for Doppler (Grain Jitter) Added Grain Size selection for Audio Pitch/Doppler Improved Pitch Logic (DC Blocking for low end)

version.author: SBP & AI
version.changelog: v3.4.1: Rename effect to "sbp_WhooshEngine" for better clarity and branding.

version.author: SBP & AI
version.changelog: v3.5.0: Added dedicated Surround Path controls (Vector/Circle) with new automation sliders. Surround output can now follow dedicated Sur Path X/Y stream from ReaWhoosh UI. Ring Modulator has been enhanced.

version.author: SBP & AI
version.changelog: v3.5.2 (2026-02-19): Added Full Circles mode for unlimited rotations using internal phase accumulator Surround modes now: Vector 3-point / Circle Arc 3-point / Full Circles Removed Speed multiplier from Circle Arc mode (3-point automation defines timing) Added Rotations Count & Start Angle parameters for Full Circles mode Fixed proper VBAP 5.1 panning with mono source distribution

version.author: SBP & AI
version.changelog: v3.5.7 (2026-02-20): Reverb moved to true post-envelope behavior (tail keeps processing after amp envelope drops) Removed final L/R gate clamp to prevent abrupt reverb cutoff v3.5.6 (2026-02-20): Smoothed post-FX envelope release to avoid abrupt reverb cutoff Output gate release now follows Verb Tail for more natural fade-out v3.5.5 (2026-02-20): Reverb pre-delay slightly shortened for closer early tail response v3.5.4 (2026-02-20): Reverb comb-filter artifacts reduced: added internal diffusion all-pass stages Added subtle delay-time modulation in reverb tank for smoother tail v3.5.3 (2026-02-20): Reverb moved to post-filter stereo stage (no new sliders) Reverb now processes L/R independently with subtle decorrelated tails

reapack.name: sbp_VO tool.lua
reapack.desc: VO-tool: Multi-function tool for processing voiceover items in REAPER (Sorting, spacing, time control, fades, trimming, rate adjustment, and ali[...]
